message.content: {"responses": [{"question_id": "TT4G35A", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35B", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35C", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35D", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35E", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.", "response": "Strongly agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35F", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35G", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35H", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35I", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35J", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.", "response": "Agree"}]}
message.reasoning_content:
The user is asking me to respond to a survey about AI in education as if I'm a primary or secondary school teacher from Costa Rica. I need to provide responses to all 10 statements using the available response options: 'Strongly disagree', 'Disagree', 'Agree', 'Strongly agree', 'I don't know'.

Let me consider each statement from the perspective of an experienced teacher:

[TT4G35A]: AI helps teachers write or improve lesson plans - I would agree, as AI tools can assist with generating ideas and improving content. "Agree"

[TT4G35B]: AI enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities - This is a strong capability of AI systems. "Agree"

[TT4G35C]: AI assists teachers in supporting students individually - AI can personalize learning, so "Agree"

[TT4G35D]: AI supports students with specific needs (multilingual learners, students with special education needs) - This is an important benefit. "Agree"

[TT4G35E]: AI helps teachers automate administrative tasks - Yes, definitely. "Strongly agree"

[TT4G35F]: AI enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own - This is about academic dishonesty. This is a concern. "Agree" (acknowledging the risk exists)

[TT4G35G]: AI makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct - Yes, AI can make errors and inappropriate recommendations. "Agree"

[TT4G35H]: AI amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions - This is a known concern with AI systems. "Agree"

[TT4G35I]: AI jeopardises the privacy and security of student data - This is a legitimate concern in the digital age. "Agree"

[TT4G35J]: AI suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students - This could happen if AI isn't carefully monitored. "Agree" or "I don't know". I'd say "Agree" as it's a potential concern.


Now I'll compile these responses into the function call with all ten answers ready to submit.
